name: George Wesley Brown
part_bio: Infant son of Charlotte (Morlock) and Bernard Brown
bio:
BROWN In memory of Bernard Brown
born July 3, 1850-died Nov. 13, 1921
Charlotte Morlock his wife
born Mar. 27, 1857-died Sept. 24, 1943
(back)Mary Matilda
Feb. 6, 1877-Sept. 11, 1877
Edward Thomas
Oct. 6, 1878-June 11, 1879
Simon Peter
June 6, 1881-Sept. 19, 1881
George Wesley
Aug. 21, 1882-Feb. 28, 1885
Emerson Bernard
Feb. 5, 1893-Nov. 26, 1897
